html.p: Lord Azzur's militia have no real interest in thieves, but you've certainly caused a rumpus so they escort you to the Watch-house. They detain you for hours, interrogate you over and over again, then extract 3 Gold Pieces from you for wasting their time! 1 is added to your Time Track; if you had no money for your bail, they detain you overnight and make you slop out the cells in the morning (so an extra 1 is added to your Time Track). When they release you, you can make for Lobster Wharf or Weaver Gate.
